summary:
### Material Information Summary:  

- **Scheme Withdrawal**  
  - Platinum Capital withdraws proposed scheme of arrangement with Platinum International Fund Complex ETF (PIXX) due to insufficient shareholder support (requires 75% approval).  
  - L1 Capital (holding ~17% stake) opposes the scheme; court meeting scheduled for 12 August 2025 to be canceled.  

- **On-Market Buy-Back Approval**  
  - General meeting on **12 August 2025** proceeds to approve an on-market buy-back of up to **20% of shares** (previously 50% if scheme failed).  
  - L1 Capital will vote in favor of the buy-back. Board unanimously recommends approval.  

- **L1 Capital’s Non-Binding Proposal & Board Changes**  
  - L1 Capital proposes replacing Platinum’s management with its own **Global Long Short strategy**, subject to shareholder approval.  
  - Requisitioned EGM to appoint three new directors (Rachel Grimes, David Gray, Douglas Farrell). If elected, two current directors (Margaret Towers, Ian Hunter) will resign.  

- **Key Dates**  
  - **General Meeting**: 12 August 2025 (buy-back vote).  
  - **EGM for Board Changes**: Date to be announced.  

No other material information identified.
